Create an app that allows users to rent out their self-driving cars to others in need of transportation.
Develop a platform for businesses to use self-driving cars as delivery vehicles, reducing their carbon footprint and costs.
Design a smart home system that uses self-driving cars to transport groceries and other household items directly from the store to the user's home.
Use self-driving cars to create a new form of public transportation, providing affordable and convenient rides to commuters.
Utilize self-driving cars as mobile offices or conference rooms, allowing individuals to work remotely while on the go.
